price: Ababangikanyamana, bageneye Imana Allah umugabane mu biremwa vyayo, mu kwubahuka kuvuga ko abamalayika ari abana bayo b’abakobwa. Mu vy’ukuri umuntu, ni ukuri arahakana inema z’Imana Allah akimonogoza, akagaragaza ubuhakanyi bwiwe mu kwidodombera ibiza, akiyibagiza inema.
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ لَهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ جُزۡءًاۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ مُّبِينٌ

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū lahu min ʿibādihi juz'an inna al-insāna lakafūrun mubīnun
